sourcesContent:
const constants = {
    PLANTS: [
      {
        name: 'garlic',
        tileInfo: 'keeps the vampires away',
        zones: '3 to 8',
        monthsToPlant: ['september', 'october', 'november'],
        expectedHarvestTime: ['may', 'june', 'july'],
        water: '1 to 2 inches per week',
        sun: 'full sun - at least 6 hours per day',
        friends: [],
        enemies: [],
      },
      {
        name: 'onion',
        tileInfo: 'cry me a river',
        zones: '3 to 9',
        monthsToPlant: ['february', 'march'],
        expectedHarvestTime: ['july', 'august'],
        water: '1 to 2 inches per week',
        sun: 'full sun - at least 6 hours per day',
        friends: ['carrot', 'beet', 'lettuce', 'tomato', 'rosemary'],
        enemies: ['asparagus', 'beans', 'peas'],
      },
      {
        name: 'jalapeno pepper',
        tileInfo: 'ouch that\'s hot',
        zones: '5 to 11',
        monthsToPlant: ['january', 'february', 'march'],
        expectedHarvestTime: ['march', 'april', 'may'],
        water: '1 to 2 inches per week, more when hotter',
        sun: 'full sun - at least 6 hours per day',
        friends: ['basil', 'onion', 'spinach', 'tomato'],
        enemies: ['beans'],
      },
      {
        name: 'potato',
        tileInfo: 'everyone loves potatoes',
        zones: '1 to 7',
        monthsToPlant: ['february', 'march'],
        expectedHarvestTime: ['june'],
        water: '1 to 2 inches per week',
        sun: 'full sun - at least 6 hours per day',
        friends: [],
        enemies: [],
      },
      {
        name: 'sweet potato',
        tileInfo: 'potato\'s warm-weather-loving relative',
        zones: '3 to 11',
        monthsToPlant: ['march', 'april'],
        expectedHarvestTime: ['july', 'august'],
        water: '1 to 2 inches per week',
        sun: 'full sun - at least 6 hours per day',
        friends: [],
        enemies: [],
      },
    ],
    DEFAULT_USER_SETTINGS: {
      firstName: '',
      lastName: '',
      hardinessZone: '0',
    },
    TRAITS: {
      zones: 'ideal zones for growing',
      monthsToPlant: 'ideal planting months',
      expectedHarvestTime: 'expected time to harvest',
      water: 'water needs',
      sun: 'sun needs',
      friends: 'companion plants',
      enemies: 'don\'t plant next to these',
    },
  };
  
  module.exports = constants;
